definition: thick pole/bar/rod/thick line/to mark with a thick line/to sharpen (knife)/(old) coffin-bearing pole

sentences.english: Then you can add dumbbells or a barbell resting on the back of your neck.
sentences.chinese: 然后你可以在你的颈后增加一个固定的哑铃或是杠铃。

sentences.english: Hold a barbell with an overhand grip so that it rests comfortably on your upper back.
sentences.chinese: 正手握杠铃，让它舒服地架在你的后肩上。

sentences.english: He strained and raised the barbell of 205 kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 他奋力一举，举起了205公斤重的杠铃。

sentences.english: Body Pump: Body Pump is a barbell class designed to strengthen the entire body.
sentences.chinese: 杠铃操是一种利用杠铃进行全身锻炼的运动项目。

sentences.english: Body Pump: Body Pump is a barbell class designed to strengthen the entire body.
sentences.chinese: 杠铃操是一种利用杠铃进行全身锻炼的运动项目。

sentences.english: These include lifts with dumbbells and barbells.
sentences.chinese: 这些包括举哑铃和杠铃。

sentences.english: But the clown's weight was only a bar and two balloons!
sentences.chinese: 但小丑举起的杠铃只是一根横杆和两只气球。

sentences.english: So ladies, don't fear the barbells.
sentences.chinese: 所以，女士们，不要害怕杠铃。

sentences.english: 'The barbell gives you stability and volatility' at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 杠铃式投资组合让你同时拥有稳定性和波动性。

sentences.english: Barbells and dumbbells are classic strength training tools.
sentences.chinese: 杠铃和哑铃都是经典的力量训练工具。

sentences.english: So they bought a treadmill and some weights.
sentences.chinese: 他们便买了跑步机和一些杠铃。

sentences.english: If you find any better barbell squat video, do let me know.
sentences.chinese: 如果您发现任何更好的杠铃深蹲的影片，也让我知道。

sentences.english: Don't use your body's momentum to lift the weight while performing traditional strength-training exercises.
sentences.chinese: 进行传统力量训练时不要利用身体的冲力举起杠铃。

sentences.english: And you don't need to lift any heavy barbells either.
sentences.chinese: 并且你也不需要去举沉重的杠铃。

sentences.english: How robust of the athlete to lift such a heavy barbell .
sentences.chinese: 能举起这么重的杠铃，这个运动员可真强壮啊。

sentences.english: In this article we'll take a close look at Barbell Shrugs.
sentences.chinese: 在这篇文章中，我们将仔细查找在杠铃耸肩。

definition: triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
